About.title: About Me
About.sobre: I am a developer with 1 year of practical experience in the field, currently working as an intern and developing real solutions for the market. I am studying Systems Analysis and Development at Universidade Paulista â€“ Manaus Campus. I have experience with the main technologies of the web and mobile ecosystem, including React Native, React, Node.js, SQL, MongoDB, Next.js, and TypeScript. I am driven by challenges and passionate about learning and creating solutions that make a difference.

Project1.title: My Portfolio
Project1.description: This is my personal website, the one you are currently on :). Built with React, Tailwind, and APIs.

Project2.title: Restaurant Management
Project2.description: This is a project for a restaurant management and service system, called HEST. Built with React, Node, Tailwind, and MySQL.

Project3.title: FoodBoxd
Project3.description: FoodBoxd is a menu management and rating system for cafeterias, developed in React Native with Firebase integration. It allows managers to register and edit daily and weekly menus, track user reviews, and view performance charts. Users can check menus, rate meals, and view nutritional information.

Project4.title: Blog Viewreo
Project4.description: I developed a full-stack blog using Next.js, MongoDB, NextAuth, and Prisma. The application allows users to securely authenticate, create and view posts, and interact with content. The solution implements NextAuth-based authentication, data storage and management with MongoDB and Prisma, ensuring a smooth and secure experience. The interface is built with React, being responsive and optimized for all devices. Techs: Next.js, React, MongoDB, NextAuth, Prisma.

Project5.title: Planno Landing Page
